sentence.text: Our results demonstrate that adenomyoepitheliomas are genetically heterogeneous, and qualify mutations in regulation of neurotransmitter receptor localization to postsynaptic specialization membrane, a gene whose mutations are vanishingly rare in common-type breast cancers, as likely drivers of ER-negative adenomyoepitheliomas

entity.text: regulation of neurotransmitter receptor localization to postsynaptic specialization membrane
